data.comment: The match is underway in Toronto.
Columbus have a goal kick.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Toronto in their own half.
Throw-in for Columbus at BMO Field.
Tim Ford awards Columbus a goal kick.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the home team in Toronto.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
Columbus are coming forward and Luis Diaz gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Toronto goal kick.
Toronto needs to be cautious. Columbus have an attacking throw-in.
In Toronto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Columbus awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Jozy Altidore (Toronto) has received a first yellow card.
Ball safe as Toronto is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tim Ford awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Toronto at BMO Field.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 40, Chris Mavinga blunders with an own goal. This makes it 0-1.
Ball goes out of play for a Columbus goal kick.
Throw-in Toronto.
In the minute 43, Free kick Columbus.
Columbus drive upfield and Artur gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Toronto defender.
Columbus have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Columbus in the half of Toronto.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Tim Ford blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway in Toronto.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Columbus in their own half.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 48, Goal! Jozy Altidore levels the match at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Alejandro Pozuelo.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 51, Throw-in high up the field for Toronto in Toronto.
Toronto to take a throw-in in Columbus territory.
In Toronto, Jozy Altidore (Toronto) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 52, Columbus have a goal kick.
Tim Ford signals a free kick to Toronto.
Tim Ford awards Columbus a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Columbus at BMO Field.
Toronto have been awarded a corner by Tim Ford.
Corner awarded to Toronto.
In the minute 56, In Toronto, Columbus push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Milton Valenzuela is replacing Hector Jimenez for Columbus at BMO Field.
Goal! Alejandro Pozuelo gives Toronto a 2-1 lead in Toronto.
In the minute 59, Richie Laryea with an assist there.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
Lucas Zelarrayan (Columbus) has received a yellow card from Tim Ford.
In the minute 62, In Toronto a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The away team have replaced Sebastian Berhalter with Aidan Morris. This is the second substitution made today by Caleb Porter.
Columbus make their third substitution with Derrick Etienne replacing Luis Diaz.
In the minute 63, Columbus advance rapidly upfield but Tim Ford blows for offside.
Free kick for Columbus in the half of Toronto.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Toronto.
In the minute 66, Tim Ford awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick Toronto.
At BMO Field, Aidan Morris has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Toronto in the half of Columbus.
Free kick in a good position for Toronto!
Columbus awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 71, Tim Ford signals a free kick to Columbus.
Toronto awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Toronto extend their lead to 3-1 through Richie Laryea.
In the minute 76, Great play from Marky Delgado to set up the goal.
Tim Ford signals a Columbus throw-in in Toronto's half.
Caleb Porter (Columbus) is making a fifth substitution, with Chris Cadden replacing Harrison Afful.
In the minute 78, Youness Mokhtar is replacing Pedro Santos for the away team.
Tim Ford awards Toronto a goal kick.
Free kick for Toronto in their own half.
In the minute 81, Goal kick for Toronto at BMO Field.
Greg Vanney is making the team's first substitution at BMO Field with Nick DeLeon replacing Jozy Altidore.
Toronto have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Marky Delgado for Toronto has been booked by Tim Ford and receives a first yellow card.
At BMO Field, Columbus are penalized for being offside.
Greg Vanney (Toronto) is making a second substitution, with Liam Fraser replacing Pablo Piatti.
In the minute 89, Jayden Nelson is replacing Alejandro Pozuelo for Toronto at BMO Field.
Patrick Mullins is on a sub for Ayo Akinola for Toronto.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Toronto.
Can Columbus get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Toronto's half?
That's full-time at BMO Field. The final score is 3-1.
The home team have replaced Richie Laryea with Tony Gallacher. This is the fifth substitution made today by Greg Vanney.
